text: The Assistant Secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor is the head of the Bureau of Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor within the United States Department of State. The Assistant Secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor reports to the Under Secretary of State for Civilian Security, Democracy, and Human Rights. == List of Assistant Secretaries of State for Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs, 1976—1993 == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Assumed Office !Left Office !President served under |- |James M.
